duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle a large amount of daily phone calls, emails, and face-to-face interactions with students, faculty, staff, and public facility users.
Maintain customer/boarder and TTEC horse files.
Prepare invoices for monthly board and team and public events.
Update the website and social media.
Organize and work with appropriate personnel to plan events.
Manage and maintain the TTEC Online Store, utilizing TouchNet, as well as the TIX, Inc. online ticketing system to manage event stall and RV reservations.
Answer phone calls, voicemail, texts & emails.

education_certification.credential: High school plus six years experience in related field. Additional education may substitute for experience on a year for year basis.
